Wisdom: مَنْ رَأَى الْمَوْتَ بِعَيْنِ يَقِينِهِ رَآهُ قَرِيباً
enWisdom: One who sees death with the eyes of his certitude, sees it nearby
How close is life to death!
There is none whose arrival is nearer than death
There is no absent one that approaches quicker than death

Wisdom: إِنَّ غَائِباً يَحْدُوهُ الْجَدِيدَانِ اللَّيْلُ وَالنَّهَارُ لَحَرِيٌّ بِسُرْعَةِ الْأَوْبَةِ
enWisdom: Indeed the absent one who is driven forward by the [succession of the] new night and day, is indeed worthy of a quick return

Wisdom: إِنَّ غَداً مِنَ الْيَوْمِ قَرِيبٌ يَذْهَبُ الْيَوْمُ بِمَا فِيهِ وَيَأْتِي الْغَدُ لَاحِقاً بِهِ
enWisdom: Verily tomorrow is close to todayThis day will pass with what is in it and tomorrow will come [soon] following it

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْمَوْتَ لَمَعْقُودٌ بِنَوَاصِيكُمْ وَالدُّنْيَا تُطْوَى مِنْ خَلْفِكُمْ
enWisdom: Verily death has been tied to your forelocks whilst this world coils behind you

Wisdom: إِذَا كُنْتَ فِي إِدْبَارٍ وَالْمَوْتُ فِي إِقْبَالٍ فَمَا أَسْرَعَ الْمُلْتَقَى
enWisdom: When you are moving away [from this world] and death is moving towards you, then how quickly you will meet each other!

Wisdom: رُبَّمَا شَرِقَ شَارِقٌ بِالْمَاءِ قَبْلَ رِيِّهِ
enWisdom: Sometimes the choker (or drinker) is choked by water [and dies] before quenching his thirst

Wisdom: رُوَيْداً يُسْفِرُ الظَّلَامُ كَأَنْ قَدْ وَرَدَتِ الْأَظْعَانُ‏ يُوشِكُ مَنْ أَسْرَعَ أَنْ يَلْحَقَ
enWisdom: Slowly! Darkness is disappearing; as though those who had departed have arrived [at their final destination] and those who hasten will soon join
